Deep Dive: Why WYSIWYG not always a good idea?

Because creators should be able to create the quiz and players should be able to quiz, not everything will be WYSIWYG. In editor mode, Lexical supports rich text editing with great key bindings. But for learning mode, we will need React to load the quiz anywhere, web or mobile to make the quizzes playable with right recommendations.
It doesn't have the plugins by default but we can create it.
For, now that's it but we will be adding more interactive elements that will not always be WYSIWYG.
